canCloseListing(uint160,address).details: Reverts if caller is not the listing seller

returns.index: The listing's index in the array

canCreateListing(address,uint256,uint256.details: Reverts if inputs are invalid or max listings reached

params.amount: The amount of tokens to list
params.price: The listing price in USD (8 decimals)
params.seller: The address of the seller creating the listing

returns.listingId: The unique identifier assigned to the new listing (sequential, starts at 1)
returns.newArrayLength: The updated length of the listings array after adding this listing
returns.newIndex: The array index where this listing will be stored (0-based)

canPauseListing(uint160,address).details: Reverts if caller is not the listing seller or listing is closed

returns.index: The listing's index in the array

canPurchase(uint160,address,uint256).details: Reverts with specific error if validation fails

params.buyer: The address of the potential buyer
params.quantity: The quantity the buyer wants to purchase

canUpdateListing(uint160,address).details: Reverts if caller is not the listing seller or listing is closed

returns.index: The listing's index in the array

canWithdrawPlatformProceeds(address,addr.details: Reverts if caller is not the platform proceeds beneficiary

canWithdrawSellerProceeds(address,addres.details: Reverts if caller is not the seller

params.seller: The seller address whose proceeds are being withdrawn

canWithdrawTokens(uint160,address).details: Reverts if caller is not the listing seller or listing is not closed

returns.index: The listing's index in the array

params.universalProfile_: Address of the Universal Profile contract

verifyPermissions(address,address,uint25.details: Calls the Universal Profile's Key Manager to verify permissions

canCloseListing(uint160,address).notice: Validates if caller can close a listing

canCreateListing(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Validates if caller can create a new listing

canPauseListing(uint160,address).notice: Validates if caller can pause/unpause a listing

canPurchase(uint160,address,uint256).notice: Validates if a buyer can purchase from a listing

canUpdateListing(uint160,address).notice: Validates if caller can update a listing's price

canWithdrawPlatformProceeds(address,addr.notice: Validates if caller can withdraw platform proceeds

canWithdrawSellerProceeds(address,addres.notice: Validates if caller can withdraw seller proceeds

canWithdrawTokens(uint160,address).notice: Validates if caller can withdraw tokens from a closed listing

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the Universal Profile address

verifyPermissions(address,address,uint25.notice: Verifies LSP6 permissions for a call
